name: Arcadieu
description:
The Legend of Arcadieu takes place in a mystical kingdom inside a videogame. 

You accidentally become great legendary hero and must find your way back home. With the help of a cute mage and a beautiful warrior, you must battle a horde of sexy monsters to reach your goal.

Features
  • 5 different girls.
  • RPG parody comedy.
  • Choices matter in the character affection.
  • Romance with the characters of your affection.
  • Different endings based on your choices.
